title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: The Dark Side of Policy Learning: Understanding Public Value Destruction Mechanisms

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: They can classify and explain two or more types of value destruction (design failure/normative failure) that may occur in policy learning processes.
They can logically evaluate the mechanisms of public value and service destruction through real-world case analyses.
They can systematically structure policy learning failure cases using mathematical modeling (graphs/matrices).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
